html:
10.19.21  4:54 pm   If the world is moving too quickly, does the Earth need to slow down or do I need to speed up?

      describe why you think it's moving quickly. describe what things seem to be moving, and then also try to describe how you think it should be, if things moved at the proper pace

10.19.21  4:54 pm   i really enjoy your music? how do you feel about that?

      seems too good to be true

10.19.21  4:48 pm   does it get tiring answering all of these questions?

      each one makes me stronger. although sometimes i get tired out from all the strength

10.19.21  4:48 pm   You captured the emotion of a dream really well. Is that what you meant to do? I'm guessing so, since the song ended when you woke up

      i respect dreams a lot. very frequently in my work, i ask 'what would a dream do here'. i've used that as a guideline for many years now, in everything i do

10.19.21  4:45 pm   What is your opinion on 12 string guitars?

      sounds lovely, when tuned right. though it might be a lot to deal with

10.19.21  4:47 pm   opinion on sea pickles

      i'm skeptical

10.19.21  4:37 pm   should i buy a volvo?

      you could, but it's also ok if you don't

10.19.21  4:34 pm   What kind of dream speaks to you the most?

      the ones that have free new song ideas or concepts in them, which i may be able to use in my work

10.19.21  4:34 pm   favorite dessert?

      hotdog sandwich

10.19.21  4:34 pm   Is a Hot-Dog a sandwich?

      why stop there

10.19.21  4:31 pm   Will you ever go on a tour of some kind? That'd be epic 

      i've always wanted that, but i don't think i can handle it. especially now, when physical public gathering is such a complicated issue

10.19.21  4:29 pm   Any new instruments you've been playing with?

      common sense

10.19.21  4:28 pm   In the off chance that you are a person, could you explain what you like about being one?

      got to be the feelings

10.19.21  4:20 pm   Why are you such a bizarre figure?

      just trying to get by

10.19.21  4:16 pm   Do you create the music first before making the cool music video or do you have a cool idea first before going into making the song?

      for music videos (the ones for songs, which most of them are these days) the audio song is made entirely first, before doing any of the video

10.19.21  4:14 pm   When will you just be a normal artist

      maybe thursday

10.19.21  4:12 pm   what you got you inspired to make ''more then a dream''

      a long time ago i got inspired to make as many songs as i can. i'm still carrying out that goal to this day

10.19.21  4:11 pm   when did you write 'more than a dream'

      in late april, 2021

10.19.21  4:09 pm   Is water wet?

      if so, that would be front page news

10.19.21  4:04 pm   whats your favorite song you've written?

      it's my job to write my new favorite

10.19.21  2:25 pm   If I remember correctly, about 2 years ago someone asked you or an anagram of the next video's title and you said "hottest new hot feeling". I've been puzzling about this for a long time, what is that and anagram for?

      they asked for an anagram for the title of the new song. "hottest new hot feeling" is an anagram of "the title of the new song". it was also posted to the anagrams page, around that time

10.19.21  1:22 pm   Have you ever considered releasing chord sheets for some of your soongs

      yes, even though they would only be an approximation at best

10.19.21  1:10 pm   where do you stand on the alignment chart?

      way off

10.19.21  12:36 pm   Have you found that for which you have been looking?

      sometimes i do, sometimes i don't

10.19.21  11:40 am   a tuesday arrives and i get the bill wurtz jitters

      i probably have them worse than you

10.19.21  10:04 am   what is songwriting to you? is it a career or a passion project or whatever?

      all 3, in this order: 2,1,3

10.19.21  9:44 am   thank you. you made me realize 5.5 is in the middle of 1 and 10

      it's the least i could do

10.19.21  9:42 am   When will you start doing everything?

      right away

10.19.21  9:12 am   do you do anything else besides music?

      sometimes i make videos to go with the music. or sometimes i make videos for music to go with

10.19.21  4:05 am   Thoughts on custard?

      seems implausible

10.19.21  2:59 am   can you give me a song recommendation?

      all of them are good. that's the problem i'm having

10.19.21  2:02 am   What are your thoughts on the fact that there is no nothing because nothing is nothing, which makes it something, because "nothing" is not nothing, and thus nothing can truly be nothing?

      ah, the basics of negation

10.19.21  1:37 am   do you prefer vulnerability or resilience? in yourself, and in others

      why not both

10.19.21  1:01 am   So, with the modes, do I just use them to improvise? Like, I do a random chord progression, and use the right scale or mode over it will sound good? thanks man

      no need to 'use' them. just play what you gotta play. the mode thing is just a way to describe or somehow categorize what happened

10.18.21  11:18 pm   the best take has the sound of the click track bleeding through. how do i remove it

      it's part of the percussion now

10.18.21  11:07 pm   Is the earth a hexagon

      no, but it features a lot of hexagons

10.18.21  9:45 pm   Hey, what's the best way to learn keys if I mostly just play guitar?

      the most important thing you can do is get a keyboard

10.18.21  9:28 pm   what are you working on now?

      songwriting

10.18.21  6:40 pm   Given an infinite amount of time, will anything that can happen happen? 

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

10.18.21  5:22 pm   What's the worst piece of musical advice you could give?

      unfortunately it's impossible to answer that, because music is so mischievous that it thrives on any advice. it will thrive on the wrong advice. it also loves to disobey advice

10.18.21  3:37 pm   i'm writing a song and there's a part where i can't decide if i should use a different key from the rest of the song or not. advice?

      you won't know until you write it. basically what you gotta do here is write what you want, then you can check what key it's in, if you're still curious

10.18.21  3:19 pm   what is your favorite statistic?

      it's gonna be ok

10.18.21  12:43 pm   what's the first thing that comes to mind

      everything comes to mind at the same time. this can be problematic

10.18.21  12:15 pm   I got a new phone. What should I do with it?

      call the whole world

10.18.21  11:07 am   are u real?

      that would explain those extremely realistic feelings i've been getting

10.18.21  9:43 am   what is the true meaning of friendship? x

      co existence

10.18.21  9:19 am   Is there anything that is really crazy?

      yes

10.18.21  9:19 am   how much earlier was the part "do you Love me?" recorded in i'm a princess

      that was recorded on march 21, 2019

10.18.21  7:23 am   i feel lost. how can i know what to do?

      you'll have to guess. with each guess you'll learn more

10.18.21  6:35 am   why don't you use capital letters?

      why don't you
